channel.title: Washington County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Washington County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City. I-5 continues north to Portland. I-205 is the eastern loop around Portland. Seattle bound traffic, or traffic bound for I-84 east might find I-205 faster than going through downtown Portland.

item.title: I-5 North - Portland Route Diagram
item.description: Portland area route diagram on I-5 north approaching I-205 junction.

item.title: I-5 North Approaching Exit 288
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/Oregon City. I-5 continues north to Portland. I-205 is the beltway around the east side of the Portland metropolitan area.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 289 and 286
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road. Approaching Exit 286 - I-205 North/West Linn/Oregon City.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 289
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road. An I-5 south shield is attached to the sign structure.

item.title: I-5 South Approaching Exit 288
item.description: I-5 south approaching Exit 288 - I-205 North/West Linn/Oregon City. I-205 is the beltway around the east side of the Portland metropolitan area. I-205 rejoins I-5 again north of Vancouver, Washington.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 290 and 289
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 290 - Lower Boones Ferry Road. Approaching Exit 289 - Nyberg St./Tualatin-Sherwood Road.

item.title: I-5 South - Exits 291 and 290
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 291 - Carman Drive. Approaching Exit 290 - Lower Boones Ferry Road.

item.title: End OR-217 South at I-5
item.description: End OR-217 south at I-5. Use right lane for I-5 south to Salem. Use left lane for I-5 north to Portland. Continue ahead for Kruse Way into Lake Oswego. The OR-217 freeway ends here.

item.title: OR-217 South at Exit 7
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 7 - 72nd Ave. Approaching I-5 to Salem and Portland. The OR-217 south freeway ends at I-5.

item.title: OR-217 South Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-217 South approaching I-5 to Salem and Portland.

item.title: OR-217 South - Exit 6
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 6 - OR-99W/Tigard/McMinnville.

item.title: OR-217 South Approaching Exit 6
item.description: OR-217 south approaching Exit 6 - OR-99W/McMinnville/Tigard.

item.title: OR-217 South - Exit 5
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 5 - Greenburg Road.

item.title: OR-217 South - Exit 4B
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 4B - OR-210/Scholls Ferry Road.

item.title: OR-217 South - Exit 4A
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 4A - Hall Blvd.

item.title: OR-217 South - Exit 3
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 3 - Denney Road.

item.title: OR-217 Frontage Road in Beaverton Approaching OR-10
item.description: OR-217 Frontage Road in Beaverton approaching OR-10. Use left lanes for OR-217 south to I-5 and Tigard.

item.title: OR-217 South Frontage Road Approaching OR-10
item.description: OR-217 South Frontage Road approaching OR-10. Use right lane for OR-10 - Beaverton-Hillsdale Highway. Use left lanes for OR-217 freeway.

item.title: OR-8 East At OR-217 South Onramp
item.description: OR-8 East at OR-217 South onramp. Use OR-217 south for I-5; use OR-217 north for US-26.

item.title: OR-8 West at OR-217 South
item.description: OR-8 West at OR-217 South onramp. Use OR-217 south for I-5.

item.title: OR-8 West at at OR-217 North
item.description: OR-8 west at OR-217 north. Use OR-217 north for US-26; use OR-217 south for I-5.

item.title: OR-8 West Approaching OR-217
item.description: OR-8 west approaching OR-217 north to US-26. Continue through the underpass for OR-217 south.

item.title: US-26 East Offramp at OR-8
item.description: US-26 east offramp at OR-8 split. Use left lane for OR-8 for Canyon Road and West Slope. Use right lane for US-26 West/Beaverton/Hillsboro.

item.title: Glencoe Rd. N. at US-26 Exit 57 Onramp
item.description: Glencoe Road north at US-26 (Exit 57) West to Ocean Beaches.

item.title: Glencoe Rd. S. at US-26 Exit 57 Onramp
item.description: Glencoe Road south at US-26 (Exit 57) West to Ocean Beaches and east to Portland.

item.description: OR-6 east at OR-8 east to Forest Grove.
